subject: Order #SSN1852
description_text:
When is my order going to be shipped? The order was confirmed by you on
June 25 and on June 27 I received an email saying the order is on the way
and I received a shipping number yet FedEx has not received or picked up
the package.

conversations.body_text: Hi John Zoeller,  Your parcel was shipped from China and is now in the US Customs, UPS will pick it up after the customs clearance is completed and there will be a logistics update only then, thank you for your understanding. Your package is expected to be delivered on or around the 6th.

Thank you for the clarification.

On Tue, Jul 1, 2025, 11:44 PM service@simsonn.com
